reviewText:
This is the video that caused my 16 yr old to fall in love with Opera! It is not on staged but filmed in real locations like a movie. There is not better art direction and opulent settings than those by Zeffirelli the Master of opera. The lush romantic settings are so ideal for the famous story. Placido
Domingo is a handsome sexy lead and the soprano perfect for the role. This is a collector's piece ! Cherish it!
This movie was made by angels  for those of us who love opera and good art.  Don;t miss it.
